directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil; add potatoes and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool and dice the potatoes.
Combine the potatoes, radishes, onion, blue cheese and mayonnaise in a large bowl; mix until the mayonnaise evenly coats the ingredients.
ingredients: 2 bunches red radishes, trimmed and diced
title: Red, White and Blue Potato Salad
